name: Kunoichi (itch) (Intergalactic Musume)
description:
This is a silly little Game & Watch style game that was made for the Unity Create & Code Summer 2020 course.

You're a kunoichi who must defend her shrine from demons.

The onscreen controls work by clicking or on devices with touchscreens, but otherwise Up and Down arrows move the player and spacebar fires.

Currently the Android version de-aligns the onscreen buttons with where they should be, but they will still work fine.

Source is available here, be warned, it's bad: https://github.com/kirbysuperstar/kunoichigame

This project uses assets from the following places:

  • kcaze's 1-bit Fantasy Creatures Pack
  • Kenney's 1-bit Pack
  • Grand Theft Marmot's Sound Effects Generator
  • photo of Sengen Shinto Shrine by Gary Lee Todd
